summary.title: minimum-mission-application
summary.description:
The system is a heterogeneous vehicle system used for ocean operations. 
The minimum application includes a command and control application, neptus, which is running on a pc onshore or from a boat.
The receiver of this message is the LAUV, running the onboard application DUNE. 
The Manta is acting as a gateway and forwarding messages from neptus to DUNE.
Neptus as well as manta and the LAUV can communicate over Wifi.
Manta and the LAUV can also communicate over acoustic channels.
The LAUV only supports UDP.

threats.title: Spoof the operator
threats.description: Spoof the operator.
threats.mitigation: Require operator to log in with two factor authentication.

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat
threats.description: A generic repudiation threat
threats.mitigation: All activity is logged on neptus and can also be verified on a second instance of neptus.

threats.title: Get remote access to C&C application
threats.description: An attacker gets full access to the neptus application because of weak password protection.
threats.mitigation: Require authentication to run the neptus application.

threats.title: Spoof neptus application
threats.description: An attacker runs its own instance of the neptus application and connects to the vehicle
threats.mitigation: The vehicles shall authenticate all entities that connect to it.

threats.title: Generic DoS threat
threats.description: An attacker succeeds to run a DoS attack either by jamming or flooding
threats.mitigation:
Frequency hopping spread spectrum and detect and reroute.
Authenticate packages and limit response to non-valid packages.

threats.title: Tamper neptus application
threats.description: Attacker remotely logs into operators laptop in the unsecured network and changes application code.
threats.mitigation: Use two factor authentication to log in.

threats.title: Repudiation on commands from neptus
threats.description: An attacker manages to send commands to the vehicle either from the operators neptus instance or from his own running instance of neptus.
threats.mitigation: All activity on neptus and the LAUV is logged.

threats.title: Read information on neptus
threats.description: Currently, an attacker can run his own instance of neptus and see all activity from the vehicles.
threats.mitigation: Only allow authenticated entities to connect to the vehicles.

threats.title: Send invalid message
threats.description: Send an invalid message and cause the DUNE application to crash and make the vehicle non responsive.
threats.mitigation: Validate the origin of the messages and drop the message if not trusted. Limit response to invalid messages.

threats.title: Generic spoofing threat
threats.description: Attacker may run/simulate his own instance of the manta application.
threats.mitigation: Authenticate all vehicles with hardware credentials.

threats.title: Generic tampering threat
threats.description: Attacker may gain physical access to the vehicle and tamper the hardware.
threats.mitigation: Various mitigations. See detailed threat model for LAUV for more information.

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat
threats.description: Attacker might overwrite or delete log files that are not reported to neptus in real-time.
threats.mitigation: Encrypt log files.

threats.title: Generic informtion disclosure threat
threats.description: Attacker might be able to read the collected data on the LAUV.
threats.mitigation: Various mitigations. See detailed threat model for LAUV for more information.

threats.title: Generic elevation threat
threats.description: No generic elevation threat. Only one privilege level.
An attacker intercepts the Wifi connection and gets access to sensitive data like mission plans
threats.title: Packet sniffing
threats.mitigation: Encrypt messages.

threats.title: Man in the middle attack
threats.description: Attacker may tamper the sent data.
threats.mitigation: Provide integrity and encryption for messages

threats.title: Blocking Wifi band
threats.description: DoS attack on the wifi network.
threats.mitigation: Enable ethernet connection to manta whenever possible to provide other communication channels.

threats.title: Man in the middle attack
threats.description: Attacker may tamper the sent data.
threats.mitigation: Provide integrity and encryption for messages.

threats.title: Packet sniffing
threats.description: An attacker intercepts the Wifi connection and gets access to sensitive data like mission plans
threats.mitigation: Encrypt messages

threats.description: DoS attack on the wifi network.
threats.mitigation: Use other communication channels such as acoustic, iridium or UMTS.
threats.title: Blocking Wifi band

threats.description: Attacker may tamper the sent data.
threats.title: Man in the middle attack
threats.mitigation: Provide integrity and encryption for messages.

threats.title: Packet sniffing
threats.description: An attacker intercepts the Wifi connection and gets access to sensitive data like mission plans
threats.mitigation: Encrypt messages.
Use other communication channels such as acoustic, iridium or UMTS.
threats.description: DoS attack on the wifi network.
threats.title: Blocking Wifi band
Man in the middle attack
threats.description: An attacker intercepts the acoustic connection and inject false messages, compromising the integrity.
threats.mitigation: Authenticate and encrypt messages.

threats.description: Attacker can read Iridium messages.
threats.mitigation: End-to-end message encryption
threats.title: Man in the middle attack
Man in the middle attack
threats.description: The attacker introduces a false mobile tower, called IMSI catcher. It allows the attacker to control communication parameters like encryption algorithms and to eavesdrop the traffic. (3gpp)
threats.mitigation: End-to-end message encryption and authentication.

threats.title: DoS attack
threats.description: DoS attack on gsm network
threats.mitigation: LAUV is still reachable by iridium.

threats.title: Generic informtion disclosure threat
threats.description: No generic information disclosure threat.
threats.mitigation: UMTS provides confidentiality.

threats.title: Man in the middle attack
threats.description: Attacker can read Iridium messages.
threats.mitigation: End-to-end encryption of messages.

threats.title: Generic tampering threat
threats.description: No generic tampering threat

threats.title: Generic DoS threat
threats.description: No/A generic DoS threat? did not find any
Attacker sends any valid command to vehicle over 3G.
threats.title: Text message spoofing
threats.mitigation: Authenticate and encrypt messages

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat
threats.description: No generic repudiation threat. Every action is logged on the manta.

threats.title: Text message spoofing
threats.description: Attacker sends any valid command to vehicle over 3G.
threats.mitigation: Authenticate and encrypt messages.

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat
threats.description: A generic repudiation threat
threats.mitigation: All activity on dune is logged and reported to neptus.

threats.title: Access router
threats.description: Attacker manages to log into the router on the manta and view network credentials.
threats.mitigation: Restrict access to router to authenticated entities.

threats.title: Spoof manta application
threats.description: Attacker may run/simulate his own instance of the manta application.
threats.mitigation: Authenticate manta instances with hardware credentials.

threats.title: Generic elevation threat
threats.description: No generic elevation threat. Only one privilege level.

threats.title: Generic DoS threat
threats.description: An attacker succeeds to run a DoS attack either by jamming or flooding
threats.mitigation:
Frequency hopping spread spectrum and detect and reroute.
Authenticate packages and limit response to non-valid packages.

threats.title: Generic tampering threat
threats.description: Attacker can connect to the manta and change the application code.
threats.mitigation: Authenticate all entities that want to connect to the manta.

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat
threats.description: No generic repudiation threat. All activity is logged on the manta and reported to neptus.
The attacker introduces a false mobile tower, called IMSI catcher. It allows the attacker to control communication parameters like encryption algorithms and to eavesdrop the traffic. (3gpp)
threats.mitigation: End-to-end message encryption

threats.title: Man in the middle attack
threats.description: An attacker intercepts the acoustic connection and get access to sensitive data like mission plans (really received over acoustic??)
threats.mitigation: Encryption at message level
Secure state estimation. Use the inputs from other sensors to estimate the accuracy   of the potentially faulty sensors.
threats.title: GPS spoofing
threats.description: Spoof GPS data in terms of location and/or time.

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat
threats.description: No generic repudiation threat. GPS is logged on the LAUV and reported to neptus.
